00017 template <class PIX>
00018 class XVWindow : public XVImageBase<PIX> {
00019  protected:
00020   using XVImageBase<PIX>::width ;
00021   using XVImageBase<PIX>::height ;
00022   using XVImageBase<PIX>::posx ;
00023   using XVImageBase<PIX>::posy ;
00024 
00025  protected:
00026 
00027   const char * windowTitle;
00028 
00029   XVImageRGB<PIX> * frames_buf;
00030   int                  buffer_count;
00031

00033 
00034   XVWindow() : XVImageBase<PIX>(), frames_buf(NULL) {}
00035   XVWindow(int w, int h) : XVImageBase<PIX>(w, h), frames_buf(NULL) {}
00036 
00037   virtual void map(void) = 0;
00038   virtual void unmap(void) = 0;
00039

00041

00044   virtual void CopyImage(int, u_short) = 0;
00045   virtual void CopySubImage(const XVImageRGB<PIX> &,bool flip=0) = 0;
00046 
00047   virtual void swap_buffers(void) = 0;
00048   virtual void flush(void) = 0;
00049 
00050   virtual XVImageRGB<PIX> getDisplayedImage(int, int, int, int) = 0;
00051 };
